ValidationRule.description: Makes sure that the account is not Veritiv Headquarters when Status is changed to Closed. Only applies to the 'Sales Support' record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Id <>"005700000016aec", /* 'sfdc admin' User */ RecordType.DeveloperName ="Sales_Support", ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed" ), Information_Email__c = FALSE, Is_Spam__c = FALSE, AccountId = "0017000000NJvZc" /* 'Veritiv Headquarters' Account record */ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Veritiv Headquarters may not be used when closing this Case
